notes: [] : brackets / {}: braces / (): parentheses / <> : carrots (or less than, more than]
JSON files always start with either an array [] or an object {}
JSON filse cannot have comments, so put any comments in this array
Commas go between items in an array or object, but ther should never be a trailing comma
All property name must be in quotation marks
All string quotation marks must be double quotes
Usea linter like jsonlint.com to check
